Description:
We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Procurement Speacialist that will be responsible for the purchasing of office supplies to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of the office supplies industry, as well as experience in sourcing, negotiating, and purchasing office supplies for businesses.The Procurement Speacialist will be responsible for a variety of tasks, including:Sourcing office supplies: This involves identifying and contacting suppliers, researching prices and terms, and negotiating contracts.
Purchasing office supplies: This involves placing orders, tracking shipments, and ensuring that supplies are delivered on time and in good condition.
Managing inventory: This involves keeping track of inventory levels, ordering supplies as needed, and ensuring that supplies are stored properly.
Providing customer service: This involves responding to customer inquiries, resolving problems, and ensuring that customers are satisfied with their orders.
Maintaining records: This involves keeping track of orders, invoices, and other relevant documents.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in business administration, supply chain management, or a related field
2+ years of experience in the office supplies industry
Strong understanding of the office supplies market
Excellent negotiation and communication skills
Excellent English language
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
